name: Keyboard
desc: A keyboard piano is a musical instrument with a set of keys that produce sound when pressed. It can be acoustic or electronic, with electronic versions offering a variety of sounds and effects.

name: Recorder
desc: Most people like the natural wood. When natural wood is treated correctly, it produces an amzing tone. We offer a variety of wooden recorders, from beginner to expert, everyone will love our recorder. They are made specially from different types of woood to produce the sound of your choice.

name: Guitar
desc: A guitar is a stringed instrument with a body, neck, and usually six strings, played by plucking or strumming

name: Ukelele
desc: A ukulele is a small, four-stringed instrument from the guitar family. It has a light, bright sound and is typically played by strumming or plucking the strings.

name: Harmonica
desc: A harmonica is a small, handheld wind instrument with metal reeds. It is played by blowing or drawing air through the holes, producing different pitches, and is commonly used in blues, rock, and folk music.

name: Tuba
desc: A tuba is a large brass wind instrument with a deep, rich sound. It has a wide bell and is played by buzzing the lips into a mouthpiece while pressing valves to change pitch.
